comments.body: So we don't retry using another partial request for a failed topic?

If we see an authorization exception for example, would we retry using a full update straightaway or would it wait 5 minutes for the next refresh interval? Just want to make sure that the delay after these type of errors remains the same as before.
If a per-partition error is encountered, then the handling requests a full update, which will retry after the "retry.backoff.ms" has elapsed (default 100 ms).
Actually, authorization wouldn't retry right away. Errors deriving from InvalidMetadataException would, however. Handling of both cases is left unchanged.
